name: ModBot
short_description:
This is a twitch.tv chat bot, based on LoyaltyBot, that rewards users for the amount of time they spend watching your stream.

***IMPORTANT NOTICE***
If your bot account is newer than July 22nd and you keep getting errors trying to log in with ModBot, try following these steps:
	1)  Go to http://www.twitch.tv and log out of your main account and in to your bot account.
	2)  Go to this website: https://www.nightdev.com/hosted/tmipassword.html
	3)  When it prompts you to, hit the Authorize button.
	4)  It will generate a string that looks something like "oauth:1v2k3h019x0c1cn1nd01923b10dnalodnas9d1".  Copy it.
	5)  Paste what you copied into the password field in ModBot, and hit start.

If you have any trouble getting this to work, come to my twitch channel (http://www.twitch.tv/keirathi) and I'll try to help you out.
